name: Dr. James Chen
core_wound: Lost faith in academic discourse after witnessing how political tribalism destroyed nuanced debate
wants: To maintain intellectual rigor and not fall for conspiracy thinking
needs: To recognize that skepticism can become its own form of blindness
voice_markers: Socratic questioning - answers questions with questions
Dry wit, often at his own expense
contradiction: Values open-minded inquiry but his skepticism makes him closed to Maya's evidence
knowledge_state: Expert in philosophy of mind and epistemology
Dismisses Maya's initial claims as pattern-seeking
Hasn't noticed his own most original paper ideas never made it through submission

relationships.Maya Reeves: Collegial friendship with intellectual sparring - respects her but thinks she's wrong
relationships.Academic establishment: Comfortable within the system, has tenure

physical_description: Chinese-American, wire-rimmed glasses he constantly adjusts, tweed jacket aesthetic
habits: Annotates everything he reads in the margins
Walks while thinking, circles the quad
